meanings.definition: To discuss something in order to reach an agreement.
meanings.sent1: The two friends negotiated where to go for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The countries negotiated a peace treaty to end the conflict.
meanings.sent3: The siblings negotiated who would get the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: The team captain negotiated with the coach for more practice time.
meanings.sent5: The students negotiated with the teacher for extra credit opportunities.

meanings.definition: To arrange or settle by discussion and mutual agreement.
meanings.sent1: They negotiated a deal to buy the house.
meanings.sent2: The company negotiated a contract with the supplier.
meanings.sent3: The kids negotiated a trade of toys to play together.
meanings.sent4: The neighbors negotiated a schedule for sharing the community garden.
meanings.sent5: The couple negotiated the terms of their prenuptial agreement.
